actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 to eliminate the support requirements for divorced and surviving divorced wives.

summary.text: Eliminates the requirement of paying support benefits to divorced wives and surviving divorced wives, who are not married, of miners who are victims of Black Lung Disease.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 to eliminate the support requirements for divorced and surviving divorced wives.
